flavorText: Seeds from Jund don't drift gently on the wind. They get up and stampede.

foreignData.flavorText: Samen aus Jund lassen sich nicht sanft vom Wind treiben. Sie stehen auf und laufen Amok.
foreignData.name: Sporenausbruch
foreignData.text: Domäne Bringe für jeden Standardlandtyp unter den Ländern, die du kontrollierst, einen 1/1 grünen Saproling-Kreaturenspielstein ins Spiel.

foreignData.flavorText: Las semillas de Jund no vuelan suavemente en el viento. Arman una estampida.
foreignData.name: Estallido de esporas
foreignData.text: Dominio Pon en juego una ficha de criatura Saprolín verde 1/1 por cada tipo de tierra básica entre las tierras que controlas.

foreignData.flavorText: Les graines de Jund ne se font pas doucement porter par le vent. Elles se lèvent et elles galopent.
foreignData.name: Explosion de spore
foreignData.text: Domaine — Mettez en jeu un jeton de créature 1/1 verte Saprobionte pour chaque type de terrain de base parmi les terrains que vous contrôlez.

foreignData.flavorText: I semi di Jund non vengono trasportati gentilmente dal vento. Si alzano in piedi e fuggono precipitosamente.
foreignData.name: Esplosione di Spore
foreignData.text: DominioMetti in gioco una pedina creatura Saprolingio 1/1 verde per ogni tipo di terra base tra le terre che controlli.

foreignData.flavorText: ジャンドの種は、のんびり風に吹き流されたりはしない。 目覚め、襲い掛かるのだ。
foreignData.name: 胞子の噴出
foreignData.text: 版図 ― あなたがコントロールする土地の中の基本土地タイプ１つにつき、緑の１/１の苗木・クリーチャー・トークンを１体場に出す。

foreignData.flavorText: Em Jund, as sementes não se espalham suavemente com o vento. Elas se levantam e estouram.
foreignData.name: Estouro de Esporos
foreignData.text: Dominar Coloque em jogo uma ficha de criatura 1/1 verde do tipo Saprófita para cada tipo de terreno básico entre os terrenos que você controla.

foreignData.flavorText: Семена из Джанда не переносятся ласковым ветром. Они поднимаются и табуном мчатся вперед.
foreignData.name: Прорыв Спор
foreignData.text: Владения Положите в игру одну фишку существа 1/1 зеленый Сапролинг за каждый тип базовой земли среди земель под вашим контролем.

foreignData.flavorText: 出自勇得的种子不愿仅只随风飘散。 它们会起身狂奔。
foreignData.name: 孢子爆发
foreignData.text: 领土～由你操控的地之中每有一种基本地类别，便将一个1/1绿色腐生物衍生物放置进场。

name: Spore Burst
originalText: Domain Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play for each basic land type among lands you control.

rulings.text: To determine the number of basic land types among lands you control, look at the lands you have on the battlefield and ask yourself whether the subtypes Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest appear within that group. The number of times you say yes (topping out at five) tells you how powerful your domain abilities will be.

How many lands you control of a particular basic land type is irrelevant to a domain ability, as long as that number is greater than zero. As far as domain is concerned, ten Forests is the same as one Forest.

A number of nonbasic lands have basic land types. Domain abilities don’t count the number of lands you control — they count the number of basic land types among lands you control, even if that means checking the same land twice. For example, if you control a Tundra, an Overgrown Tomb, and a Madblind Mountain, you’ll have a Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest among the lands you control. Your domain abilities will be maxed out.

text: Domain — Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token for each basic land type among lands you control.
